Package entity

Interface AggregateLimitRptDelegate

All Superinterfaces:
Bean, com.guidewire.pl.persistence.core.BeanMethods, BundleProvider, Comparable<Bean>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AggregateLimitRpt, ClaimAggregateLimitRpt
@Generated(value="com.guidewire.pl.metadata.codegen.Codegen", comments="AggregateLimitRptDelegate.eti;AggregateLimitRptDelegate.eix;AggregateLimitRptDelegate.etx") public interface AggregateLimitRptDelegate extends Bean
AggregateLimitRptDelegate Common state and behavior shared by both the AggregateLimitRpt and ClaimAggregateLimitRpt entities. These entities contain denormalized AggregateLimit amount used values

  • Method Details

    • getAggLimitCalcCriteria

      AggLimitCalcCriteria getAggLimitCalcCriteria()
      Gets the value of the AggLimitCalcCriteria field. Exclusions for limit used calculations

    • getClaimCurrency

      Currency getClaimCurrency()
      Returns the currency specified by the policy period's claim currency property. All claims in a policy period are guaranteed to have the same currency.
      Returns:
      a currency, possibly null

    • getCoverageLine

      CoverageLine getCoverageLine()
      Gets the value of the CoverageLine field. The associated coverage line.

    • getLimitType

      AggregateLimitType getLimitType()
      Gets the value of the LimitType field. Aggregate limit type: by loss date or by reported date

    • getLimitUsed

      CurrencyAmount getLimitUsed()
      Gets the value of the LimitUsed field. The amount of the limit that has been used that is tracked within ClaimCenter.

    • getPolicyPeriod

      PolicyPeriod getPolicyPeriod()
      Gets the value of the PolicyPeriod field. PolicyPeriod with which the aggregate limit is associated. This property exists because CoverageLine may be null; when CoverageLine is not null, it must equal CoverageLine.PolicyPeriodID

    • getValueType

      AggregateType getValueType()
      Gets the value of the ValueType field. Aggregate type: limit or deductible.

    • isValid

      Boolean isValid()
      Gets the value of the Valid field. Indicates if the limit used is up-to-date.

    • setAggLimitCalcCriteria

      void setAggLimitCalcCriteria(AggLimitCalcCriteria value)
      Sets the value of the AggLimitCalcCriteria field.

    • setCoverageLine

      void setCoverageLine(CoverageLine value)
      Sets the value of the CoverageLine field.

    • setLimitType

      void setLimitType(AggregateLimitType value)
      Sets the value of the LimitType field.

    • setPolicyPeriod

      void setPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod value)
      Sets the value of the PolicyPeriod field.

    • setValid

      void setValid(Boolean value)
      Sets the value of the Valid field.
